duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintaining the continuous flow of product from the vendors to the customer for picking, shipping, and receiving functions.
Scheduling all Inbound and Outbound orders in company systems.
Coordinating order processing with all appropriate systems and personnel.
Prioritizing and monitoring the daily workload to ensure timely completion and adherence to customer requirements.
Maintaining records relative to inbound and outbound deliveries and resolving any discrepancies.
Assisting in preparing outbound paperwork and working closely with customer service.
Researching past due orders that have not been confirmed as properly shipped.
Filling in for other administrative roles as needed and working on the floor as required.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED and 0-2 years of relevant experience.
Familiarity with materials handling and radio frequency equipment.
Working knowledge of Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, and Outlook) is preferred.
